PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13172022-12-15,  ,  ,  CIRNAC,  NA, 
ActCanada Petroleum Resources Act
SubjectOrder Prohibiting Certain Activities in Arctic Offshore Waters, 2022
PrecisORDER PROHIBITING CERTAIN ACTIVITIES IN ARCTIC OFFSHORE WATERS, 2022 in order to (1) extend the Order to December 31, 2023; (2) continue to prohibit any person or oil and gas licence holder from beginning or continuing any work or activity in Canada’s Arctic waters; and (3) continue to preserve the rights of active oil and gas licence holders.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0274 Publication Date: 2023-01-04
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Prohibiting Certain Activities in Arctic Offshore Waters, 2022
precis: ORDER PROHIBITING CERTAIN ACTIVITIES IN ARCTIC OFFSHORE WATERS, 2022 in order to (1) extend the Order to December 31, 2023; (2) continue to prohibit any person or oil and gas licence holder from beginning or continuing any work or activity in Canada’s Arctic waters; and (3) continue to preserve the rights of active oil and gas licence holders.
